message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product.  It's worth at least $80 to me, but I'm willing to start with a price of $90.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! $75 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $85. Let's see if we can find a happy middle ground.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78.
Bob, I'm getting a bit closer to your price. I can do $82, but that's really my bottom line.  Let me know if you're ready to close the deal.
I'm almost there, but I can do $79.
